name: Deliberator
description:
Escape the facility by searching for clues, key cards, and items to help you unlock doors. You have a limited number of footsteps you can take before you travel back in time to the start of the level, where you can use your newfound knowledge to progress further than before.

Created by students at Media Design School for Production class (third year game development; see their BSE and BCT courses; https://www.mediadesignschool.com/ ).
